alert.note: Alert for Miner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:48PM MDT until July 05 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN KINGSBURY...LAKE...EASTERN SANBORN...SOUTHEASTERN BEADLE...CENTRAL MINNEHAHA...MINER...SOUTHWESTERN BROOKINGS AND NORTHEASTERN TURNER COUNTIES... At 247 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near De Smet to Howard to near Spencer In McCook County, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 230 PM CDT, an 80 mph wind with trees down was reported in Cavour. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Canova, Winfred, Lake Herman State Park, Oldham, Orland, Madison, Ramona, Wentworth, Sinai, Chester, Hartford, Wall Lake and Nunda. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
